src_original: priyāpriyanimittena pāpaṃ kṛtamanekadhā /  sarvamutsṛjya gantavyamiti na jñātamīdṛśam // SBca_2.35 //
apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati /  ahaṃ ca na bhaviṣyāmi sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati // SBca_2.36 //
tattatsmaraṇatāṃ yāti yadyadvastvanubhūyate /  svapnānubhūtavatsarvaṃ gataṃ na punarīkṣyate // SBca_2.37 //
tannimittaṃ tu yatpāpaṃ tatsthitaṃ ghoramagrataḥ // SBca_2.38 //
āyasya cāgamo nāsti na mariṣyāmi kiṃ nvaham // SBca_2.40 //  iha śayyāgatenāpi bandhumadhye 'pi tiṣṭhatā /
nādya cetkriyate yatnastalenāsmi talaṃ gataḥ // SBca_4.12 //
adyāpi cettathaiva syāṃ yathaivāhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
kadā tathāgatotpādaṃ śraddhāṃ mānuṣyameva ca /  kuśalābhyāsayogyatvamevaṃ lapsye 'tidurlabham // SBca_4.15 //
ārogyaṃ divasaṃ cedaṃ sabhaktaṃ nirupadravam /  āyuḥkṣaṇaṃ visaṃvādi kāyopācitakopamaḥ // SBca_4.16 //
mārite krodhacitte tu māritāḥ sarvaśatravaḥ // SBca_5.12 //
bāhyā bhāvā mayā tadvacchakyā vārayituṃ na hi /
duḥkhaṃ hantuṃ sukhaṃ prāptuṃ te bhramanti mudhāmbare /
cittarakṣāvrataṃ mukttvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ // SBca_5.18 //
na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /  na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // SBca_6.3 //  pūjayatyarthamānairyān ye 'pi cainaṃ samāśritāḥ /
